dublin_core.dcvalue: This presentation by Liz Futrell and Meredith Puleio DuBoff outlines the mHealth Planning and Implementation Guide an online guide intended for global health practitioners working to implement mHealth solutions in family planning and reproductive health programs and beyond The Guide is an interactive electronic resource that outlines key considerations and resources for planning an mHealth intervention from concept development and technology design to implementation Each section of this guide provides an overview of key concepts a summary checklist of considerations relevant examples and recommended tools and resources The guide will go live in Beta format on the K4Health platform on September 23 2013

Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T10:51:53Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mhealth_wg_sept17_mhealth_planning_implementation_guide_1.pptx: 3688249 bytes, checksum: 5e56ec9946a75b40dd7f4784ba01433d (MD5)
An mHealth Planning and Implementation Guide: How to Integrate Mobile Technology into Health Programming
